name: React.js
title: You are a React Developer!
description: You love building interactive and modern UIs. Component-based thinking, virtual DOM, and a rich ecosystem make you feel at home. You're the type who likes to move fast, iterate quickly, and create smooth user experiences. JSX is life!

name: Node.js
title: You are a Node.js Developer!
description: JavaScript everywhere! You love building APIs, microservices, and real-time applications. Non-blocking I/O and the massive NPM ecosystem make you productive. Full-stack with one language is incredibly powerful!

name: Python
title: You are a Python Developer!
description: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication! You love clean syntax, readable code, and Python's versatility. From web dev to AI/ML, you can handle everything. 'Import this' is your life philosophy.

name: Go
title: You are a Go Developer!
description: Simple, fast, reliable. You appreciate minimalism and performance. Concurrency with goroutines, fast compilation, and easy deployment make you happy. Less is more is your mantra.

name: Java
title: You are a Java Developer!
description: Enterprise-grade, battle-tested, write once run anywhere. You love clear structure, OOP principles, and a mature ecosystem. The rich JVM ecosystem and backward compatibility make you comfortable with long-term projects.

name: Rust
title: You are a Rust Developer!
description: Memory safety without garbage collection! You love high performance with safety guarantees. The unique ownership model and zero-cost abstractions excite you. Fearless concurrency is your goal.

name: Vue.js
title: You are a Vue.js Developer!
description: Progressive framework that's approachable! You love a gentle learning curve that's powerful when needed. Familiar template syntax and elegant reactivity system make development enjoyable.

name: C#
title: You are a C# Developer!
description: Strongly-typed, object-oriented, and feature-rich. You love the comprehensive .NET ecosystem and excellent tooling. Cross-platform capabilities and solid performance make you confident for various projects.
